column5: The apartment complex is 10 minutes away from Downtown Houston and Midtown! It's in a very quiet community. The complex does house a good amount of younger people (younger than 35) because it is near the University of Houston. Want to work out during your trip? We have a private gym! The apartment itself has a private bedroom and private restroom with a queen bed that can fit two.
column8: Great Travel Space for those in need!
